Plot income-vote ecological correlation

Source: R/diagnostics-ecological.R
plot_income.Rd

Downloads tract-level household head income via censobr and produces a scatter plot or side-by-side map of income vs. vote share.

Usage

plot_income(
  result,
  variable = NULL,
  census_year = NULL,
  type = c("scatter", "map"),
  ...
)

Arguments

result

An interpElections_result object (Brazilian).

variable

Variable to correlate with income. Accepts column name, ballot number, candidate name, or party abbreviation.

census_year

Census year for income data. NULL auto-detects from result$census_year. Must be 2000, 2010, or 2022.

type

Character. "scatter" (default) or "map".

...

Ignored.

Value

A ggplot object (invisibly). Prints the plot.

Details

Income data is downloaded from IBGE via the censobr package. No deflation is applied — values are used as-is for within-year correlation analysis.

Variable sources by census year:

  • 2000: censobr::read_tracts(2000, "Basico"), variable VAR06

  • 2010: censobr::read_tracts(2010, "ResponsavelRenda"), computed as V022 / V020

  • 2022: censobr::read_tracts(2022, "ResponsavelRenda"), variable V06004
